verses.verse: And it came to <S%H4428>pass<s%>, when all the kings which were on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in the <S%H2022>hills<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>valleys<s%>, and in all the <S%H2348>coasts<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>, heard <S%H8085>there<s%>;
That they <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves <S%H3162>together<s%>, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6310>accord<s%>.
And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> what <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and to <S%H5857>Ai<s%>,

They did <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H6195>trickery<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and made as if they had been <S%H6737>ambassadors<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H8242>sacks<s%> upon their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, and <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H4997>bottles<s%>, <S%H1087>old<s%>, and <S%H1234>tore<s%>, and bound <S%H6887>up<s%>;

And <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H5275>shoes<s%> and <S%H2921>patched<s%> upon their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H1087>old<s%> <S%H8008>garments<s%> upon <S%H3899>them<s%>; and all the bread of their <S%H6718>provision<s%> was <S%H3001>dry<s%> and <S%H5350>moldy<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, and to the men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, We be <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>: now therefore <S%H3772>make<s%> you a covenant with <S%H1285>us<s%>.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, <S%H194>Perhaps<s%> you <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3772>us<s%>; and how shall we make a covenant with <S%H1285>you<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, We are your <S%H5650>servants<s%>. And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H370>them<s%>, Who are you and from from where come <S%H935>you<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3966>him<s%>, From a very <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> because of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: for we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8089>fame<s%> of <S%H6213>him<s%>, and all that he did in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,

And all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and to <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which was at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>.

Why our <S%H2205>elders<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of our <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H6720>food<s%> with <S%H3027>you<s%> for the <S%H1870>journey<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, and say unto <S%H5650>them<s%>, We are your servants: therefore now <S%H3772>make<s%> you a covenant with <S%H1285>us<s%>.

This our <S%H3899>bread<s%> we took <S%H2525>hot<s%> for our <S%H6679>provision<s%> out of our <S%H1004>houses<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> we came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> unto <S%H3001>you<s%>; but now, behold, it is dry, and it is <S%H5350>moldy<s%>:

And these <S%H4997>bottles<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, which we <S%H4390>filled<s%>, were <S%H2319>new<s%>; <S%H1234>and<s%>, behold, they are torn: and these our <S%H8008>garments<s%> and our <S%H5275>shoes<s%> are become <S%H1086>old<s%> by reason of the <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7230>long<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%>.
And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of their <S%H6718>food<s%>, and <S%H7592>asked<s%> not counsel at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H3772>them<s%>, and made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H2421>them<s%>, to let them live: and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> swore unto <S%H7650>them<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H8085>them<s%>, that they heard that they were their <S%H7138>neighbours<s%>, and that they <S%H3427>lived<s%> among <S%H7130>them<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto their <S%H5892>cities<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>. Now their <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, and <S%H3716>Chephirah<s%>, and <S%H881>Beeroth<s%>, and <S%H7157>Kirjath<s%>â€“jearim.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H5387>not<s%>, because the princes of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto them by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against the <S%H5387>princes<s%>.

But all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, We have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto them by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: now therefore we <S%H3201>may<s%> not touch <S%H5060>them<s%>.
This we will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H2421>them<s%>; we will even let them live, lest <S%H7110>wrath<s%> be upon <S%H7621>us<s%>, because of the oath which we swore unto <S%H7650>them<s%>.

And the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2421>them<s%>, Let them live; but let them be <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>; as the <S%H5387>princes<s%> had promised <S%H1696>them<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H1696>them<s%>, and he spoke unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, Why have you <S%H7411>deceived<s%> <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, We are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H3427>you<s%>; when you live among <S%H7130>us<s%>?

Now therefore you are <S%H779>cursed<s%>, and there shall none of you be <S%H3772>freed<s%> from being <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, and <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Because it was <S%H5046>certainly<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, how that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you all the <S%H776>land<s%>, and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3966>you<s%>, therefore we were very <S%H3372>afraid<s%> for our <S%H5315>lives<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H6213>you<s%>, and have done this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.
And <S%H2009>now<s%>, behold, we are in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: as it <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> unto you to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H6213>us<s%>, do.
And so <S%H6213>did<s%> he unto <S%H5337>them<s%>, and delivered them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they killed them <S%H2026>not<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> them that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he should <S%H977>choose<s%>.
